reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It was very easy to install these glass protectors on the watch screen. Just follow the directions even though there for a phone just change it to watch it. It works great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing fit and very durable.
reviews.reviewText: First I was bit skeptical about the product, but in few minutes I applied my self ( first time doing this type of thing ) couldn't believe how it easy it was. protects well and amazingly did not scratch a bit. Definitely get one

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to install
reviews.reviewText: Easy install, very durable. Not noticeable, perfect fit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works as intended
reviews.reviewText: It’s all good but not for first time installers … takes a couple of tries to get it right. It would be great to have an installation kit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars perfect fit on the watch (glass)
reviews.reviewText: With the flat screen of the Apple Watch Ultra, these glass screen protector applies evenly, and this one is a perfect fit. It fits over the glass and does not cover the titanium case. I have a black hard plastic case on the watch, and the screen protector works perfectly with it, as there is still ~1mm gap between the screen protector and the case.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Interferes with touch
reviews.reviewText: I 3D printed an alignment frame to help with installation. The frame fits perfectly. You can see from the photo that the glass does not quite match the watch face, it is about 1/2 mm narrower. But I’m not complaining about that.The real problem is that it interferes with touch. I was nearly unable to enter passcode to unlock Watch. It is odd because you can see that the watch detects your finger but it won’t complete the action, e.g. a button will animate but not activate. If you press long and firmly you can get them to work but normal touch is very often rejected. I think the glass is too thick so the amount of touch the Watch detects does not cross threshold and is rejected as inadvertent. If you type on keyboard you will see some letters are taken, some not, some appear briefly but then are removed. Sounds like maybe a watch bug but when I removed screen protector everything works perfectly all the time. And it worked perfectly before I installed the protector.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Easy installation if your familiar with screen protectors, includes everything needed for installation. The screen protector sits flush on the screen on the watch giving it an effect like it is not even there. I was worried about a raised screen look but it was perfect. I always use super shields on all my device’s definitely a quality product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars No guide and Printed Instructions Don't Match
reviews.reviewText: I'm not sure how long this will last, but the product looks good for the most part. The issue is getting it lined up perfectly. If you try to lift it up again to realign it bubbles form around the edges that won't go away. It's a frustrating process. Also, the instructions included were for a phone and don't match up with the watch. There were guide stickers in the box, but there was no instruction on how to use them. Also the first protector I tried to use, the film on it would not come off. So it was unusable. Luckily on the 2nd one the film came right off. Not sure about the 3rd one as I haven't attempted to use it yet. If the bubbles on the edges continue to annoy me I may try the 3rd one. But honestly, I'll probably try to find one with a guide to assist with the install. I know the Apple Watch Ultra just came out, but this seemed like a rushed product without the proper install instructions or guide.
Works as advertised, almost invisible when fitted to the watch screen. Also impressed with speed of delivery. 4 business days from U.S to Australia! 🇦🇺
